venue.name: Sawyer Hill EcoVillage: Mosaic Commons and Camelot Cohousing

item.description:
Interested in Cohousing?

We're under construction! Homes still for sale!

Come see the buildings in process and hear about how we are building our homes and our community.

To join us, meet us at the site First Sundays of the Month at 11:00 and Third Sundays of the month at 12:30.

Cohousing is a type of neighborhood designed and managed by the people who live there. Cohousing combines privacy and community in a clustered, pedestrian-oriented neighborhood.

You own your own home, as well as a share of the common facilities. The common buildings will include a large dining room, kitchen, living room, children's space, exercise room, and workshops.

http://www.sawyerhill...

group.name: Sawyer Hill EcoVillage: Mosaic Commons & Camelot Cohousing
